string.text: Knocked Down Heroes Influences Troops
Your stupid general is dead! Nobody will save you now!
Enemy's general is dead! We will win this war!
Your idiot captain is dead! Give up, you dogs!
Enemy's captain is dead! They stand no chance against us!
Another one of your lapdogs is dead!
We have slain another one of their lords!
Morale penalties when heroes are knocked down
When Troop Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 4]
When Troop Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 6]
When Troop Knocks Down General
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an ordinary soldier defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 8]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 12]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 14]
When Unassigned Hero Knocks Down General
The enemy suffers a morale loss when an unassigned hero defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 16]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 20]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 22]
When Formation Captain Knocks Down General
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a formation captain defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 24]
When General Knocks Down Unassigned Hero
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a general defeats an enemy hero not serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 28]
When General Knocks Down Formation Captain
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a general defeats an enemy hero serving as a formation captain. Works for both sides. [Default: 30]
When General Knocks Down General
The enemy suffers a morale loss when a genral defeats an enemy general. Works for both sides. [Default: 32]
Technical settings
Mod update interval in seconds
This mod updates hero and troop lists every XX seconds. It doesn’t need to be changed. [Default: 30]
Logging for debugging
Logging for debugging. [Default: false]
